title: NEW SEASON
body:
What does everyone think of where they got placed this season in ranked?
Bronze is full of trolls,akfs,rude nasty people.
How many people do you think has stopped playing?
How many of yous are ready to stop playing?
Do you think they fucked up this year?
Who wants to be replaced into where they were last season?
Do you think people need to be given another fair  to get away from all the trolls?

replies.body: I'm 4/3. With only 2 technical loses. 1 lose was due to a power outage and subsequently made it a leave game history and then penalised me one more provisional. So I lost 2 games for one power outage. But other than that I'm still probably going to be placed Plat 3 - 1.
yeah your power outage is a bad luck..

im more talking about people in the lower ranks...
Bronze is just so bad with it and u cant even nearly get out or have one normal game anymore
